frontMatter.title: Continuous Improvement Strategy
frontMatter.metaDescription: Rapidly respond to market conditions and learnings to sustain a competitive edge. Iteratively improve the product by aligning with business goals and timelines.

checklist.question: Have you identified industry trends and competitors?
checklist.expectation: Overview of market research, industry trends analysis and competitor analysis.

checklist.question: Have you identified any under-served niche?
checklist.expectation: Overview of product research to exploit a currently under-served niche and identify if there any need you could potentially fulfill.

checklist.question: Have you considered "build or buy" decisions?
checklist.expectation: Where your product should buy or build themself considering Risk, Cost and Problem.
